item.title: the HWs of MIT. Missing-semester(2020)
item.description: Lecture 1. Shell Create a new directory called missing under /tmp 1 > mkdir -p /tmp/missing ğŸ“’ -p means Create intermediate directories as required Use touch to create a new file called semester in missing. 1 2 > cd ~/tmp/missing > touch semester Write the following into that file, one line at a time: 1 2 #!/bin/sh curl --head --silent https://missing.
